meanings.definition: an alloy of copper and zinc used as a substitute for gold in jewelry
meanings.sent1: The jeweler crafted a beautiful necklace using pinchbecks instead of gold.
meanings.sent2: She admired the pinchbecks bracelet, appreciating its unique shine.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, he wore a pinchbecks crown, pretending to be a king on a budget.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like pinchbecks under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The pinchbecks earrings caught everyone's attention with their golden-like glow.

meanings.definition: a person who is stingy or miserly
meanings.sent1: The pinchbecks refused to contribute to the charity event.
meanings.sent2: He was known as a pinchbecks among his friends for never picking up the tab.
meanings.sent3: The pinchbecks at the office always brought their own coffee to avoid sharing.
meanings.sent4: Her boss's heart seemed to be made of pinchbecks, never willing to give a raise.
meanings.sent5: The pinchbecks' house was always dark to save on electricity costs.
